recipe.name: Spanish Cream
recipe.preparation: Combine gelatin, 1/4 sugar, 1/2 cup cold milk and salt.  Let stand 1 minute.  Beat egg yolks and remaining milk.  Stir into gelatin mixture.  Cook, stirring over *low* heat about 5 minutes.Remove from heat.  Stir in vanilla.  Chill until it mounds slightly when dropped from spoon.Beat egg whites and cream of tartar.  Beat in 1/4 cup sugar slowly.  Fold gelatin mixture into egg whites.  Pour into mold and chill at least 8 hours.  Top with custard sauce, whipped cream or crushed berries.
